message.name: SHEEP_RTT_DATA
message.description: Message containing a sheepRTT sample. Position of the drone and the distance to the tag with a specific id.
message.field: Altitude (MSL). Note that virtually all GPS modules provide both WGS84 and MSL.
Distance between the drone and the tag.

message.name: SHEEP_RTT_ACK
message.description: Message used to acknowledge receiving of SHEEP_RTT_DATA packet at the GCS.
